# Loading packages

```{r}

library("tidyverse")
```

# Loading data files

```{r}

blood <- read_csv(file = "data/_raw/blood.csv")

tonsil <- read_csv(file = "data/_raw/tonsil.csv")

thymus <- read_csv(file = "data/_raw/thymus.csv")
```

# Writing data files

```{r}

write_csv(x = blood,
          file = "data/blood_load.csv")

write_csv(x = tonsil,
          file = "data/tonsil_load.csv")

write_csv(x = thymus,
          file = "data/thymus_load.csv")
```
